scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && cp -R src dist
scripts.build: cd dist/js/ && for f in *.coffee; do f=${f%%.*}; cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify ${f}.coffee | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > ${f}.js; done
scripts.build:withsourcemaps: cd dist/js/ && for f in *.coffee; do f=${f%%.*}; cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify ${f}.coffee --debug | exorcist ${f}.js.map > ${f}.js && uglifyjs ${f}.js -c warnings=false -m --in-source-map ${f}.js.map --source-map ${f}.js.map -o ${f}.js; done
scripts.postbuild: rm -rf dist/node_modules dist/my_modules && rm dist/**/*.coffee && npm run postcss
scripts.minifyify: cd src/js/ && browserify welcome.coffee --debug -p [minifyify --output welcome.js.map --uglify [--compress]] > welcome.js
